scripts.test-item: export NODE_ENV=test &&  sequelize db:migrate:undo:all  && sequelize db:migrate  && nyc --require @babel/register  mocha ./api/test/test-item.js --timeout 10000 --exit
scripts.test-player: export NODE_ENV=test &&  sequelize db:migrate:undo:all  && sequelize db:migrate  && nyc --require @babel/register  mocha ./api/test/test-player.js --timeout 10000 --exit
scripts.test-equp: export NODE_ENV=test &&  sequelize db:migrate:undo:all  && sequelize db:migrate  && nyc --require @babel/register  mocha ./api/test/test-equipment.js --timeout 10000 --exit
scripts.coverage: nyc npm run test-equp && nyc npm run test-item && nyc npm run test-player && npm run generate-lcov && npm run coveralls-coverage && npm run codeclimate-coverage
